name: One Giant Leap (itch)
description:
Welcome to One Giant Leap, a simple puzzle platformer. You might be familiar with the genre, but this game's got a small twist:

     You've got a single jump

Think carefully and use your only jump wisely.

Entry for the Game Maker's Toolkit game{jam}.

Controls:
Z - Jump
X - Interact
R - Reset Level
ESC - Close Game

Credits:
Developed by Team Kirbonic
Music by Bensound and Teknoaxe

Disclaimer: The game is still under development, and was rushed a bit due to the game jam's time constraints, but will hopefully be improved in the future.
